verbose_text: Activated Chk1 blocks late replication origins by disrupting the TopBP1 - Treslin complex, promotes translesion DNA polymerases, mediates homologous recombination at broken forks through Rad51 and BRCA2, regulates fork elongation and arrests cell cycle progression by promoting the degradation of Cdc25A (reviewed in Gonzalez Besteiro and Gottifredi, 2015).
